crim.description: Per capita crime rate by town

zn.description: Proportion of residential land zoned for lots over 25,000 sq.ft.

indus.description: Proportion of non-retail business acres per town

chas.description: Charles River dummy variable (= 1 if tract bounds river; 0 otherwise)

value_dict.0: The tract does not bound the Charles river
value_dict.1: The tract bounds the Charles river

rm.description: Average number of rooms per dwelling

age.description: Proportion of owner-occupied units built prior to 1940

dis.description: Weighted distances to five Boston employment centres

rad.description: Index of accessibility to radial highways

black.description: 1000(Bk - 0.63)^2 where Bk is the proportion of blacks by town

medv.description: Median value of owner-occupied homes in $1000s

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in real estate market analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing market in Boston, please predict the median value of owner-occupied homes.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted median value of owner-occupied homes is _______ (in $1000s).

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in socio-economic data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing market in Boston, please predict the percentage of lower status of the population.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted percentage of lower status of the population is _______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in property analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing market in Boston, please predict the average number of rooms per dwelling.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted average number of rooms per dwelling is _______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in education data analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing market in Boston, please predict the pupil-teacher ratio by town.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted pupil-teacher ratio by town is _______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in urban development analysis.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the features of the housing market in Boston, please predict the proportion of owner-occupied units built prior to 1940.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted proportion of owner-occupied units built prior to 1940 is _______.
